TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectParameterCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameter>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Data.Objects.ObjectParameter>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class ObjectParameterCollection Implements ICollection(Of ObjectParameter), IEnumerable(Of ObjectParameter)
type ObjectParameterCollection = class interface ICollection<ObjectParameter> interface seq<ObjectParameter> interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents the query parameters as objects that are defined in an .

span.span: Represents the query parameters as objects that are defined in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將查詢參數表示成在 中定義的 物件。Represents the query parameters as objects defined in an . 這個類別無法被繼承。This class cannot be inherited. 傳遞給查詢產生器方法的參數是由序列 (Sequence) 中後續的 執行個體 (Instance) 所彙總 (Aggregate)。The parameters that are passed to query builder methods are aggregated by successive instances of an in the sequence. 您可以使用傳回 的 屬性來存取這些參數。They can be accessed by using the property, which returns the . 加入參數之後，只要尚未編譯或執行查詢，就可以從集合中移除參數，而且可以清除此集合。After parameters have been added, they can be removed from the collection and the collection can be cleared, as long as the query has not been compiled or executed. 參數名稱無法變更，但是參數值則可以隨時變更。Parameter names cannot be changed, but values can be changed at any time. 參數在 中必須是唯一的。Parameters must be unique in the . 集合中不能有兩個參數同名。There cannot be two parameters in the collection with the same name. 當您使用構成方法 (如 、、 和 ) 時，將會合併這些參數。When using composition methods, such as , , and , the parameters are merged. 當參數集合不相容或不完整時，系統就會擲回例外狀況 (Exception)。An exception is thrown when the sets of parameters are incompatible or incomplete. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 查詢產生器方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0)。For more information, see [Query Builder Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/05685434-05e6-41c2-8d5e-8933b88a40b0). ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將新的參數加入至集合，並且取得集合中的參數計數。The example adds new parameters to the collection and gets the count of the parameters in the collection. 然後，它會逐一查看 並顯示集合中每個參數的名稱、型別和值。Then it iterates through the and displays the name, type, and value of each parameter in the collection. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Count_Add_Indexer](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectparametercollection_count_add_indexer)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Count_Add_Indexer](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectparametercollection_count_add_indexer)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是以參考為基礎的比較。This is a reference-based comparison. 也就是說，如果指定的查詢參數物件與集合中的參數物件包含相同名稱，就只會移除位於集合中的參數 (如果它是相同物件的話)。That is, if a query parameter object is specified that contains the same name as a parameter object in the collection, the parameter in the collection will only be removed if it is the same object. 若要依據名稱移除物件，請先使用索引子來擷取參數執行個體，然後使用這個方法來移除它。To remove an object by name, first use the indexer to retrieve the parameter instance, then remove it by using this method. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會將兩個參數加入至集合，然後移除這些參數。The example adds two parameters to the collection and then removes the parameters. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Remove](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectparametercollection_remove)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectParameterCollection_Remove](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectparametercollection_remove)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個集合一定是可讀取/寫入，而且您可以加入、移除和修改參數。This collection is always read/write; parameters can be added, removed, and modified.
